reviews.review: Small indie company valve removed bots for competitive that forces you into a 4v5 or 3v5 if a toxic player decides to abandon and also reinforces toxic behavior that will cost you your rank. Nice job shooting yourself in the foot devs. its almost like valve is trying to kill their own games.
Very good game, its best way to spend a free time. But I really dont like hackers. They ruining all the fun in the game. :(
Won 15 games in a row, tied two, and lost one. Then I deranked...
